name: yaml-to-json
title: YAML to JSON Converter
description: Convert YAML configuration files to JSON format
content:
Overview

This application converts YAML files into JSON format, preserving the data structure and hierarchy. It uses PyYAML for safe parsing and creates properly formatted JSON output.

Features

  • Validates YAML syntax before conversion
  • Preserves nested structures and data types
  • Creates properly indented JSON output
  • Handles both .yml and .yaml file extensions

Parameters

  • Input YAML File: Upload your YAML file from stash
  • Output Directory: Select or create a stash folder for the JSON output

Output

The application generates a JSON file named {original_name}.json with the converted data structure.

Use Cases

  • Converting configuration files from YAML to JSON
  • Preparing YAML data for JSON-only APIs
  • Migrating from YAML-based to JSON-based configs
  • Creating JSON versions of YAML documentation
command: git clone https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git prod_apps_clone 2>/dev/null || (cd prod_apps_clone && git pull) && python prod_apps_clone/python/yaml_to_json.py "${inputFile}" -o "${outputDir}"
